description: Mutations for creating, updating, or deleting groups
name: groups

definition.description:
A group is a collection of typed members (e.g., sites, hosts).
Groups can include members of different types.

When you update a group or use it in a policy, the system verifies that all members are allowed in the policy's scope.
If a group is used in a policy that doesn’t support certain member types, you can't add those types to the group.
If a group already includes unsupported types, you can only assign it to a policy that supports those types.
A member type is valid if it's supported in the group and allowed in the policy scope.

audit.description: Contains creation and modification metadata for the group
audit.name: audit

possibleTypes.description: A reference identifying the Admin object. ID: Unique Admin Identifier, Name: The Admin Name
possibleTypes.name: AdminRef

possibleTypes.description: A reference identifying the ApiKey object. ID: Unique ApiKey Identifier, Name: The ApiKey Name
possibleTypes.name: ApiKeyRef

description.description: Optional free-text description for documentation or context
description.name: description

members___input.defaultValue: {paging: {limit: 100, from: 0}, sort: {name: {direction: ASC, priority: 2}, type: {direction: ASC, priority: 1}}}
members___input.name: input

definition.description: Filter, sort, and pagination applied when fetching the the list of group members.

GroupMembersListFilterInput

definition.description:
Sort group members by one or more fields.
If multiple fields are specified, the system uses their priority to determine order. For example, type with priority 1 will be used first, then name with priority 2.
definition.name: GroupMembersListSortInput
GroupMembersListInput

members.description: Lists the members in this group. Supports paging, filtering, and sorting by type and name
members.name: members

definition.description: A list of group members, pagination details, applied filters, and sorting information.

items.description: List of members that matched the query (including filtering, sorting, and paging).
items.name: items

definition.description:
Reference to a group member, including its ID, name, and type.
Used when listing or identifying members within a group.
Member types that can be referenced in a group.

paging.description: Pagination information for the result set (e.g., offset, total count).

membersCount.description: Total number of group members. When paging and filtering is used, this number may be higher than the number of members returned by the query
membersCount.name: membersCount

membersCountPerType.description: Breakdown of member count by type (e.g., number of sites, hosts, etc.).
membersCountPerType.name: membersCountPerType

definition.description: Counts how many members of each type the group contains.

membersCount.name: membersCount
